methods.comment:
* Returns a non-zero value for each of the Greek combining diacritics
         * listed in The Unicode Standard, version 8, chapter 7.2 Greek,
         * plus some perispomeni look-alikes.

methods.name: private static boolean isFollowedByCasedLetter(CharSequence s, int i)
private static A toUpper(int options, CharSequence src, A dest, Edits edits) throws IOException
methods.comment:
* Greek string uppercasing with a state machine. * Probably simpler than a stateless function that has to figure out complex context-before * for each character. * TODO: Try to re-consolidate one way or another with the non-Greek function. * *

Keep this consistent with the C++ versions in ustrcase.cpp (UTF-16) and ucasemap.cpp (UTF-8). * @throws IOException
